root.name: Socks the Cat Rocks the Hill
root.description: OverviewSocks the Cat Rocks the Hill was an SNES game in development at Kaneko. The game cast the player in the role of an anthropomorphic version of Socks, the pet cat that belonged to Bill Clinton and his family while he was President of the United States. The game's storyline involved Socks keeping the United States' nuclear launch codes away from a group of foreign spies. The game was to feature bosses with appearances based on past presidents, albeit with totally different names.
